channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024021514
item.description:
Report X-2024021514

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the hazmat cage damaged. DescribePack: The box is wet and corroded. Once opened, found that one of four plastic bottles has a broken cap and bad under cap seal. all the other bottles are covered in the damaged bottles contents. about 2 quarts has leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into a plastic spill bag lined black tote, and then into the cage.

item.title: Report X-2024021518
item.description:
Report X-2024021518

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Trailer 827981 from 532-MILW was opened roughly around 1:30. Container had been loaded upside down at back of trailer, and fell out when door of trailer was opened. Container had leaked in trailer, and was further damaged by hitting concrete floor. Paint began leaking profusely. DescribePack: Lid bent, side of container dented heavily enough to break seal on lid significantly. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediately turning container upright. Soaking up and covering spilled paint.

item.title: Report X-2024021120
item.description:
Report X-2024021120

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: MENOMONEE FALLS
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found by manager on the belt Durning unloading. noticed the box was black and looked leaking. DescribePack: The side of one of the bottles had a crack in it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a tote and given to QA to inspect for damage.

item.title: Report X-2024021339
item.description:
Report X-2024021339

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-22
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Undiscovered hazmat package discovered wet on bulk truck during unload on Outbound sort. Package was removed from vehicle and inspected. It was found that the contents were hazardous materials with no accompanying paperwork. DescribePack: All four bottles in the package had leaked due to the caps not being properly secured. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin and put underneath ventilation system in hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024021301
item.description:
Report X-2024021301

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-31
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE IN THE SYSTEM. DURING CLEANUP IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THIS NON-LEAKING PACKAGE CONTAINED AN AEROSOL CAN, BUT POSSESSED NO ORM-D LABEL TO INDICATE ANY SUCH CONTENTS.

item.title: Report X-2024020800
item.description:
Report X-2024020800

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-19
  • City: MENOMONEE FALLS
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload leaking and damaged. The drum was crushed. DescribePack: The drum has a few spots that are leaking at the top and bottom due to the dent. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the drum was placed in a red tote for QA to inspect for proper damage
